name: Flowtal Demo
description:
Save the forest by helping the Flowtal - A magical crystal flower.

Flick bees to stop them from getting to the endangered Flowtal, garner amazing combo streaks, Click on the fairies to get cool power ups that will help you in your mission, and complete fun challenges!

How high will your score be?

Controls:

Flick the bees by “throwing them” - press left mouse button down, move slightly to the desired direction and release

 

Full game on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NeyaStudios.Flowtal
